solution_line_template: Let's first calculate what remains to be paid to Mr. Lalande once he leaves the store {car_worth} - {initial_payment} = <<{car_worth}-{initial_payment}={remaining_to_pay}>>{remaining_to_pay}£
Let's split this sum into {num_installments} month installments: {remaining_to_pay} / {num_installments} = <<{remaining_to_pay}/{num_installments}={monthly_payment}>>{monthly_payment}£
